summary: This document indicates planning for the reoccupation of North Vietnam in late October 1962. It involves drafting questionnaires for people in South Vietnam and those formerly living in North Vietnam to gather information on acquaintances still in North Vietnam.
title: Indication of Planning
recipient: STATE INR DIA ARMY/ACSI NAVY AIR JCS SECDEF NSA. NIC AID US IA OCI STATE/DIR
